Package com.soa.message.handler

Interface Summary
HandlerContext Provides a HandlerFactory some context about the framework from where any constructed MessageHandler will be used.
HandlerFactory The messaging engine will create MessageHandlers through HandlerFactory implementations.
MessageContext The context of a message passed through the messaging engine.
MessageFaultCode Lists general message fault error codes and error messages that are returned to clients.
MessageHandler Implementations of this interface are passed messages with additional context.
 

Class Summary
ChainHandler MessageHandler implementation that invokes a list of other MessageHandler implementations.
DefaultHandlerContext Default HandlerContext implementation.
DefaultMessageContext Default MessageContext implementation.
DynamicHandlerChainFactory HandlerFactory implementation that will create a ChainHandler of MessageHandlers.
HandlerChainFactory HandlerFactory implementation that builds a chain of MessageHandlers.
HandlerErrorCode Constant error codes for the com.soa.message.handler package.
HandlerRole Enumeration of MessageHandler roles, consumer and provider.
 

Exception Summary
MessageFaultException Exception to indicate a fault has been encountered that should be reported to the sender of a message.
